casebody.data:
DAY v. SUPERINTENDENT OF CLIFTON T. PERKINS STATE HOSPITAL [App. No. 144,

September Term, 1965.]

Decided June 8, 1966.

*731Before Hammond, Marbury, OppenhEimer, Barnes and McWieeiams, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Application for leave to appeal is denied for the reasons set out in the opinion of Judge Jones in the lower court.

Application denied.
